give us a little more

space around the perimeter,

the labeling.

If you are labeling
within an image,

it's imperative to
simplify your labeling

make it nice and neat.

Try to put all your labels

either vertically and
/ or horizontally.

Next, question
whether you really

have to use a combination of
upper- and lower-case letters.

Why not make all of
your labels lower-case.
Get rid of your arrows.

Arrows with arrowheads are
completely unnecessary.
They are distractions as labels.

Lines without the arrow
heads are much better to use.
They're just more refined.
Rethink your colors.

How about using blue
instead of fuscia?
Please?

see more information
